description:
1.

Thank you for teaching me how to read and write, for guiding me to distinguish between what is wrong and what is right. For allowing me to dream and soar as a kite, thank you for being my friend, mentor and light.感谢您教会我读和写，教导我分辨对与错，允许我心怀梦想，像风筝一样翱翔。感谢您成为我的朋友、良师和指路明灯。

2.

Dear teacher, Thanks for supporting and enlightening all my way.亲爱的老师，感谢您一直以来的支持和教导。

3.

If only I could have your blessing for a lifetime,如果此生都能有您的支持，

4.

I would succeed the way I have done always.我会一如既往地取得成功。

5.

Have a wonderful Teachers Day教师节快乐

6.

For continually inspires me to do my best一直鼓励我要尽最大努力

7.

You help me strive for goals,您帮我朝着目标努力，

8.

I found guidance, friendship, discipline and love, everything, in one person.有一个人给了我指导、友谊，教会我守纪律，给了我爱和一切。

9.

And that person is you这个人就是您

10.

The way you teach, the knowledge you share, the care you take and the love you show make you the world's best teacher.您讲课的方式、您教授的知识、您的照顾以及您的爱，使您成为了世界上最好的老师。

11.

Sending my love and warmth to you,把我的爱和温暖给您，

12.

You have not only been a wonderful teacher but also friend, philosopher and guide,您不仅是一位好老师，而且是一个挚友、哲人和导师，

13.

May you have a memorable Teachers Day.祝您度过一个难忘的教师节。

14.

Dear teacher, you have been a great mentor and guide and have shaped my career well. I thank you for your effort and hope you remain a superb mentor for others also.亲爱的老师，您一直是一位良师和导师，帮我规划了职业生涯。我感谢您的努力，希望您也能一直作别人的良师益友。

15.

This beautiful card is for my retired teacher whose service in our school is greatly appreciated and who has been one of the stalwarts of our school with her good teaching. Teacher, I thank you with all my heart for your service.这张美丽的卡片送给我已退休的老师，我们非常感激她对学校的贡献，她优秀的教学使她成为了学校的中坚力量。老师，我真心地感激您的奉献。
